text: Roberto Maytín and Andrés Molteni was the defending champion, but they did not participate this year. Michail Elgin and Andrey Rublev won the title, defeating Federico Gaio and Alessandro Giannessi in the final, 6–4, 7–6(7–4). ==Seeds== ==Draw== ==External links== * Main Draw ATP Challenger 2001 Team Padova - Doubles
title: 2015 ATP Challenger 2001 Team Padova – Doubles
